entry.title: [WW] I’ve been smoking 2-3 of these [binoid THCP carts](https://www.binoidcbd.com/col
entry.content: I’ve been smoking 2-3 of these [binoid THCP carts](https://www.binoidcbd.com/collections/thcp-products) a month. They’ve definitely improved my mental health a lot and I’ve even become more productive. Haven’t noticed any adverse health effects. Is there any good reason I should stop?
